channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- ADSelfService Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- ADSelfService Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-0252|2024-01-15T14:38:14.748Z -- ManageEngine -- ADSelfService Plus
item.description: ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus versions 6401 and below are vulnerable to the remote code execution due to the improper handling in the load balancer component. Authentication is required in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-27310|2024-05-27T17:26:14.229Z -- ManageEngine -- ADSelfService Plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus versions below 6401 are vulnerable to the DOS attack due to the malicious LDAP query.
